magic-card.title: Magic Card
magic-card.description: A spotlight effect that follows your mouse cursor and highlights borders on hover.

android.title: Android
android.description: A mockup of an Android device.

warp-background.title: Warp Background
warp-background.description: A card with a time warping background effect.

line-shadow-text.title: Line Shadow Text
line-shadow-text.description: A text component with a moving line shadow.

morphing-text.title: Morphing Text
morphing-text.description: A dynamic text morphing component for Magic UI.

scroll-progress.title: Scroll Progress
scroll-progress.description: Animated Scroll Progress for your pages

lens.title: Lens
lens.description: A interactive component that enables zooming into images, videos and other elements.

pointer.title: Pointer
pointer.description: A component that displays a pointer when hovering over an element

smooth-cursor.title: Smooth Cursor
smooth-cursor.description: A customizable, physics-based smooth cursor animation component with spring animations and rotation effects

progressive-blur.title: Progressive Blur
progressive-blur.description: The Progressive Blur component adds a smooth blur gradient effect to scrollable content, indicating more content below or above.

grid-pattern.title: Grid Pattern
grid-pattern.description: A background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.

interactive-grid-pattern.title: Interactive Grid Pattern
interactive-grid-pattern.description: A interactive background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.

dot-pattern.title: Dot Pattern
dot-pattern.description: A background dot pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.

flickering-grid.title: Flickering Grid
flickering-grid.description: A flickering grid background made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.

code-comparison.title: Code Comparison
code-comparison.description: A component which compares two code snippets.

marquee.title: Marquee
marquee.description: An infinite scrolling component that can be used to display text, images, or videos.

globe.title: Globe
globe.description: An autorotating, interactive, and highly performant globe made using WebGL.

shimmer-button.title: Shimmer Button
shimmer-button.description: A button with a shimmering light which travels around the perimeter.

tweet-card.title: Tweet Card
tweet-card.description: A card that displays a tweet with the author's name, handle, and profile picture.

client-tweet-card.title: Client Tweet Card
client-tweet-card.description: A client-side version of the tweet card that displays a tweet with the author's name, handle, and profile picture.

bento-grid.title: Bento Grid
bento-grid.description: Bento grid is a layout used to showcase the features of a product in a simple and elegant way.

particles.title: Particles
particles.description: Particles are a fun way to add some visual flair to your website. They can be used to create a sense of depth, movement, and interactivity.

number-ticker.title: Number Ticker
number-ticker.description: Animate numbers to count up or down to a target number

ripple.title: Ripple
ripple.description: An animated ripple effect typically used behind elements to emphasize them.

retro-grid.title: Retro Grid
retro-grid.description: An animated scrolling retro grid effect

animated-list.title: Animated List
animated-list.description: A list that animates each item in sequence with a delay. Used to showcase notifications or events on your landing page.

animated-shiny-text.title: Animated Shiny Text
animated-shiny-text.description: A light glare effect which pans across text making it appear as if it is shimmering.

animated-grid-pattern.title: Animated Grid Pattern
animated-grid-pattern.description: A animated background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.

border-beam.title: Border Beam
border-beam.description: An animated beam of light which travels along the border of its container.

animated-beam.title: Animated Beam
animated-beam.description: An animated beam of light which travels along a path. Useful for showcasing the integration features of a website.

text-reveal.title: Text Reveal
text-reveal.description: Fade in text as you scroll down the page.

hyper-text.title: Hyper Text
hyper-text.description: A text animation that scrambles letters before revealing the final text.

animated-gradient-text.title: Animated Gradient Text
animated-gradient-text.description: An animated gradient background which transitions between colors for text.

orbiting-circles.title: Orbiting Circles
orbiting-circles.description: A collection of circles which move in orbit along a circular path

dock.title: Dock
dock.description: An implementation of the MacOS dock using react + tailwindcss + motion

sparkles-text.title: Sparkles Text
sparkles-text.description: A dynamic text that generates continuous sparkles with smooth transitions, perfect for highlighting text with animated stars.

spinning-text.title: Spinning Text
spinning-text.description: The Spinning Text component animates text in a circular motion with customizable speed, direction, color, and transitions for dynamic and engaging effects.

text-animate.title: Text Animate
text-animate.description: A text animation component that animates text using a variety of different animations.

scroll-based-velocity.title: Scroll Based Velocity
scroll-based-velocity.description: Scrolling text whose speed changes based on scroll speed

scratch-to-reveal.title: Scratch To Reveal
scratch-to-reveal.description: The ScratchToReveal component creates an interactive scratch-off effect with customizable dimensions and animations, revealing hidden content beneath.

shiny-button.title: Shiny Button
shiny-button.description: A shiny button component with dynamic styles in the dark mode or light mode.

box-reveal.title: Box Reveal Animation
box-reveal.description: Sliding box animation that reveals text behind it.

shine-border.title: Shine Border
shine-border.description: Shine border is an animated background border effect.

animated-circular-progress-bar.title: Animated Circular Progress Bar
animated-circular-progress-bar.description: Animated Circular Progress Bar is a component that displays a circular gauge with a percentage value.

confetti.title: Confetti
confetti.description: Confetti animations are best used to delight your users when something special happens

animated-subscribe-button.title: Animated Subscribe Button
animated-subscribe-button.description: An animated subscribe button useful for showing a micro animation from intial to final result.

cool-mode.title: Cool Mode
cool-mode.description: Cool mode effect for buttons, links, and other DOMs

pulsating-button.title: Pulsating Button
pulsating-button.description: An animated pulsating button useful for capturing attention of users.

ripple-button.title: Ripple Button
ripple-button.description: An animated button with ripple useful for user engagement.

file-tree.title: File Tree
file-tree.description: A component used to showcase the folder and file structure of a directory.

blur-fade.title: Blur Fade
blur-fade.description: Blur fade in and out animation. Used to smoothly fade in and out content.

safari.title: Safari
safari.description: A safari browser mockup to showcase your website.

iphone-15-pro.title: iPhone 15 Pro
iphone-15-pro.description: A mockup of the iPhone 15 Pro

rainbow-button.title: Rainbow Button
rainbow-button.description: An animated button with a rainbow effect.

video-text.title: Video Text
video-text.description: A component that displays text with a video playing in the background.

pixel-image.title: Pixel Image
pixel-image.description: A component that displays an image with a pixelated effect, creating a retro aesthetic.

highlighter.title: Highlighter
highlighter.description: A text highlighter that mimics the effect of a human-drawn marker stroke.

arc-timeline.title: Arc Timeline
arc-timeline.description: A curved timeline that elegantly visualizes key milestones, perfect for Web3 and AI roadmaps.

animated-theme-toggler.title: Theme Toggler
animated-theme-toggler.description: A component for theme changing animation.
